name: Bartonella henselae
label: Pathogen
description: A species of Bartonella that can cause cat scratch disease and other infections.

name: Bartonella quintana
label: Pathogen
description: A species of Bartonella that can cause infections, including endocarditis.

name: Bartonella bacilliformis
label: Pathogen
description: A species of Bartonella that can cause infections, including cutaneous vasoproliferative lesions and bacteremia.

name: Cutaneous Vasoproliferative Lesions
label: Clinical Finding
description: Lesions induced by Bartonella spp. infections.

name: Bacteremia
label: Clinical Finding
description: Presence of Bartonella spp. in the blood.

name: Endocarditis
label: Disease
description: Infection of the heart valves.

name: Systemic Vasoproliferative Lesions
label: Clinical Finding
description: Vasoproliferative lesions affecting various organs including the brain, bone, bone marrow, lymph node, skeletal muscle, and mucosal surfaces.

name: Antineutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibodies (ANCAs)
label: Lab Test Result
description: Autoantibodies associated with certain types of vasculitis.

name: Immune Complex-Mediated Glomerulonephritis (GN)
label: Disease
description: A type of glomerulonephritis caused by immune complexes.

name: Segmental Necrotizing and Crescentic Lesions
label: Pathology
description: Histological features observed in renal biopsies of B. henselae native-valve endocarditis with associated GN.

name: Inflammatory Granulomas with Microabscesses
label: Pathology
description: Histological findings in lymph nodes during CSD, characterized by inflammation, microabscesses, histiocytes, occasional giant cells, lymphocytes, and fibrosis.

name: Necrotizing Lymphadenitis
label: Disease
description: Lymph node inflammation with epithelioid/giant cells and aspects of vasculitis.

name: Wegenerâ€™s Granulomatosis
label: Disease
description: A type of vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tract and kidneys.

name: Hypersensitivity Vasculitis
label: Disease
description: A type of vasculitis caused by hypersensitivity reactions.

name: Ulcerative Skin Involvement
label: Clinical Finding
description: Skin lesions with ulcerative characteristics.

name: Epithelioid/Giant Cells
label: Cell Type
description: Cells observed in the lymph node histology.

name: Epithelioid Cells
label: Cell Type
description: Cells observed in the lymph node histology.

name: Giant Cells
label: Cell Type
description: Cells observed in the lymph node histology.

name: Neutrophilic Leukocytosis
label: Lab Test Result
description: Increased number of neutrophils in the blood.

name: Elevated Acute-Phase Reactants
label: Lab Test Result
description: Increased levels of proteins produced in response to inflammation.

name: Ulcerative Rhagadiform Lesion
label: Clinical Finding
description: A type of ulcerative skin lesion.

name: Multiple Purple Skin Areas
label: Clinical Finding
description: Multiple areas of skin with a purplish color suggestive of vasculitic lesions.

name: Abdominal and Umbilical Area
label: Anatomical Location
description: An anatomical location in the abdomen around the navel.
